data.name: Decode your friends message
data.description:
# Decode your friends message

Your friend has sent you a message but you cant quite understand it. Something is off and you need to create a function to help you decode it.

```
Jnicnglqvekwgvlich
```

### Write a function that will decode this message. Part of this Kata is to also figure out the formula for decoding. Look at the sample tests for help


#### Input:

• Only strings with characters A-Z can be decoded



#### Output:

• The decoded string must be lowercase even if the input contains upper case

   eg dLeC ---> code
   
• If the string is empty "" it should return empty ""   


• If contains spaces, special characters or numbers it cannot be decoded and will result in a message 

```
unable to decode
```

• Same for languages with no type safety (js etc) if a string is not passed it should also result in

eg null or undefined

```
unable to decode
```
